Text.val: **this is not working, need to re-assess later

SQL_STMT_U.val: select top 1 cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@dStartDate)[1]', 'date') , cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@tTimeFrom)[1]', 'time') , cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@aLongDescription)[1]', 'varchar(200)') , cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@aShortDescription)[1]', 'varchar(1000)') , cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@aEventImageURL)[1]', 'varchar(1000)') from eo where isn in (select eo2_isn from relations where relation_type = 2712 --location-event relation and relation_subtype = 12 --instance and eo1_isn = :1 --location (canada hard-coded for now, change for parameter later) and eo1_subtype = 12 --instance ) and eo_type = 2280 --event object and cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@lPublish)[1]', 'varchar(5)') = 'YES' --only published events and cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@lFeature)[1]', 'varchar(5)') = 'YES' --featured event and cast(long_comment as xml).value('(/a/@dStartDate)[1]', 'date') >= getdate()
